in general cases is managed by local IT Engineers in each location: they create rooms, working places, relocate employees, update workstation numbers, etc. Instruction on OSM usage is available at New locations (city, office, unit) are created in PMC Admin Console by Service Desk, they cannot be created in OSM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In OSM only relocations within the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"office/city\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" can be managed. If employee relocates \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to another city or country\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Relocation%20to%20foreign%20office.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relocation Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" should be initiated in UPSA by employee's Resource Manager as this procedure actually means dismissal in one EPAM office and hiring in new EPAM office.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
